suite.name: CreateCharacters

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: POST
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://marvel.qaninja.academy/accounts path_url=/accounts headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.26.0', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Length': '41', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'{"email": "thaisllaynesantana@gmail.com"}'

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: Set Suite Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current suite.

kw.name: Factory Thanos
kw.msg: &{personagem} = { name=Tricia Townsend | aliases=Thanos de X | age=3000 | team=Ordem Negra | active=False }

kw.name: POST
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://marvel.qaninja.academy/characters path_url=/characters headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.26.0', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'client_key': '6131222c2f65af00162b355c', 'Content-Length': '106', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'{"name": "Tricia Townsend", "aliases": "Thanos de X", "age": 3000, "team": "Ordem Negra", "active": false}'

kw.name: Status Should Be
kw.doc: Fails if response status code is different than the expected.

kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://marvel.qaninja.academy/characters path_url=/characters headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.26.0', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'client_key': '6131222c2f65af00162b355c', 'Content-Length': '105', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'{"name": "Sergio Simmons", "aliases": "Thanos de X", "age": 3000, "team": "Ordem Negra", "active": false}'

kw.name: POST
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://marvel.qaninja.academy/characters path_url=/characters headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.26.0', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'client_key': '6131222c2f65af00162b355c', 'Content-Length': '105', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'{"name": "Sergio Simmons", "aliases": "Thanos de X", "age": 3000, "team": "Ordem Negra", "active": false}'

kw.name: Status Should Be
kw.doc: Fails if response status code is different than the expected.

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.
